title: X-COM Classic Bundle (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Naviate to the folder of the game you want to install
- Run the "setup.exe"
- Play
Credits: this release was made possible by Swapware Games Network!
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)

This torrent contains the following X-COM classics:
X-COM Apocalypse 
X-COM Enforcer 
X-COM Interceptor 
X-COM Terror From the Deep 
X-COM UFO Defense
